BackstoryDef.title: Resource Gatherer
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] spent years extracting valuable resources from harsh rimworld environments. [PAWN_pronoun] developed keen instincts for locating mineral deposits and managing heavy excavation equipment. [PAWN_pronoun] is accustomed to backbreaking labor and harsh working conditions that would exhaust ordinary colonists.

BackstoryDef.title: Survival Expert
BackstoryDef.description: [PAWN_nameDef] participated in the grand colonization and came to a rimworld. [PAWN_pronoun] is one of the most experienced colonists in the Colonization Force, having participated in numerous successful and failed colonization attempts in their lifetime.
